title: how to bypass the instruction for antiDBI
content: This instruction stops the execution of the pin code jmp far 0x161061d, 0x33 ? how to get around this?

answers_data.content: This is the "Heaven's Gate" technique for switching from 32-bit to 64-bit code.  You'll need an updated version of Pin to proceed.

comments.text: i use Pin 3.21. is there any way to bypass this instruction with the pin tools?
